item.title: Course Structure for Ethical Hacking
item.description: The course that i am following is from TCM Academy Here is the course structure which you can also see in TCM-Sec Website The Cyber Mentor Youtube and also on before enrolling. I am going to skip to The Ethical Hacker Methodology. Special Thanks & Credits PNPT Certification Path Progression (2:32) Introduction Course Introduction (7:24) Course Discord (Important) (2:45) A Day in the Life of an Ethical Hacker (20:55) Why You Shouldn’t Be An Ethical Hacker
